overview: Leanne Morgan exudes southern charm. She is a naturally funny storyteller who gives an honest look at suburban life and the challenges of keeping her husband happy while juggling kids, dogs and cheerleading camp at the same time she’s racing to get her hair highlighted, have a colonoscopy and join weight watchers for the 7th time!  Leanne will take you on a hilarious journey through motherhood and beyond as she finds comedy amidst the chaos.
title: Leanne Morgan: So Yummy
